krio: Me name na Alimatu Maliaka Jalloh
en: My Name is Alimatu Maliaka Jalloh.

en: I live in Freetown, Sierra Leone.

en: I want to go to the bank.

en: I am walking to the shop.

krio: Ar go eat rice and chicken.
en: I will eat rice and chicken.

en: My father works on the farm.

en: I will sleep now, i am tired.

en: I want to go to the church.

en: I want to go and sleep in my room

en: I am not going to the market again the time is late
I am coming to go for class

krio: Gal pikin get right for go skul
en: Girls have the right to go to school

krio: Di pikin dem get right fo go school
en: Girls have the right to go to school

krio: Ar wan go na di farm
en: I want to go to the farm

krio: Ar wan go plant me hair
en: I want to go and plait my hair

en: I want to go to the bank to go take money

krio: Ar wan go na di shop for go buy popcorn
en: I want to go to the shop to buy popcorn

krio: Ar wan go na di bar, fo get fun with me padi
en: I want to go to the bar, to have fun with my friends

en: I want to go to the restaurant

en: I want to go to the salon to do my hair

en: I want to go to the church to pray

en: I want to go to school to learn

en: I want to go to the farm to plant rice

en: I want to go to the market to buy food

en: I want to go to the bar to drink beer

en: I want to go to the restaurant to eat food

krio: Udat rili de rul di wɔl?
en: Who is  really ruling the world?

krio: Gɔd na di ɔnli wan fɔ worship
en: God is the only one to worship

krio: As girl pikin, u for learn book.
en: As a girl child, you should gain education.

krio: Di man maraed two woman dem.
As woman, u no for lek kongosa business.
en: As a woman, you shouldn't like to gossip.

krio: Mi big brother kam na ose to we yesterday.
en: My big brother visited us yesterday.
A man should not date different women

krio: Aks fɔ Mek Dɛn Kam Fɛn Yu
en: Ask  them to come and visit you

krio: A go aks dem fɔ mek dem kam fɛn mi
en: I will ask them to come and visit me

krio: A go asks dem fɔ mek dem kam fɛn yu
en: I will ask them to come and visit you

krio: A go asks dem fɔ mek dem kam fɛn am
en: I will ask them to come and visit him

krio: A go asks dem fɔ mek dem kam fɛn ar
en: I will ask them to come and visit her

krio: A go asks dem fɔ mek dem kam fɛn wi
en: I will ask them to come and visit us

krio: A go asks dem fɔ mek dem kam fɛn dɛm
en: I will ask them to come and visit them

krio: Fɛn Usay Dɛn Go Gɛt di Mitin
en: Find out where they will be having the meeting

krio: Luk di nyu vidio, myuzik, atikul, ɛn nyuz dɛn we dɛn jɔs ad.
en: Look at the new video, music, article and news that they just added.

krio: Di pikin sidom de listin to myuzik
en: The child is sitting and listening to music.

krio: Di titi de watch di vidio dem way ar sen fo ram
en: The girl is watching the videos i sent for her

krio: ihn say ihn de reach de soon, na ride ihn de ride okada
en: He said he is reaching soon , he is riding his bike

krio: ihn say ihn de reach de soon, ihn de waka fast
en: He said he is reaching soon , he is walking fast

krio: ihn say ihn de reach de soon ihn don take motorcar
en: He said he is reaching soon, he has taken a vichle

krio: All dem number em de call u for scam u
en: All those numbers are calling you to scam you

krio: Ar don kam village for kam marade wan fine titi
en: I have come to the village to marry a fine lady

krio: U nr don say u nr de do am
en: You have not said you are not doing it

krio: Why u de ala pa the pikin
en: Why are you scolding the child?

krio: U de go na di farm ide
en: Are you going to the farm today?

krio: U de go na di markit
en: Are you going to the market?

krio: U de go na di skul
di pikin de play na the yard
en: The child is playing in the compound

krio: di pikin don cry tay ihn don sleep
en: The child cryed alot but is sleeping now

krio: di pikin don begin fo waka

en: I did not tell you anything?

krio: Di pikin don sleep tay e don wake up
en: The child slept for a long time and woke up.

krio: Ihn beteh way u go skul oooh
en: It's good that you attended school
What kind of marriage is this?

krio: Tin dɛn We Yu Go Lɛk
U go fɔ lɛk di tin dɛn

en: You should be faithful to each other

krio: Pik Wan Tɔpik we Yu Go Want fɔ No Mɔ Bɔt
en: Pick one topic you would want to know more about

krio: Fɛn usay wi kin ol wi mitin dɛn nia yu.
en: Find out where we hold our meeting close to u

krio: Ol the pikin make ihn nr go oba yanda
en: Hold the child so that he does not go over there.

krio: U go fɔ lɛk di tin dɛn
U go fɔ lɛk di tin dɛn we yu de do
en: You would love the things you are doing

krio: U go fɔ lɛk di tin dɛn we yu de say
en: You would love the things you are saying

krio: U go fɔ lɛk di tin dɛn we yu de tɔk
en: You would love the things you are talking about

krio: U go fɔ lɛk di tin dɛn we yu de wɛr
en: You would love the things you are wearing
I have class in the morning.

krio: Mi sista don go na town.
en: My sister has gone to town.

krio: Mi fren wan go na church.
en: My friend wants to go to church.
I don't want to eat greens.

krio: Di baby de cry for bobi.
en: The baby is crying for breast milk.
My father bought a new shoe.
My mother is frying bean cake.
I am going to fetch water.
The woman is sweeping the compound.
My uncle is washing the car.

krio: Dem de wash di cloth dem.
Mi bra de comb in hair.
en: My brother is combing his hair.

krio: Ar de go bank fo collect money.
en: I am going to the bank to collect money.
I want to cook jollof rice.
I want to go get fresh air.
The teacher gave us an assignment.
My sister is baking a cake.
I am watching a football match.
I am going to the corner.
I want to watch a movie.

krio: Mi padi de wait for me.
en: My friend is waiting for me.
My brother has a birthday today.
They are studying for the exam.

krio: Mi padi de help me cook.
en: My friend is helping me cook.

krio: Dem no wan go na skool.
en: They don't want to go to school.
They are running from the rain.
My sister has a big exam.
They go to church every Sunday.

krio: Mi papa de fix di rof.
en: My father is fixing the roof.

krio: Mi fren de borrow me book.
en: My friend borrowed me a book.
They are sleeping in the living room.
I went to the internet cafe.
My friend knows how to dance.
They are fixing the light pole.
My boss got a new phone.
My sister is combing her hair.
The girl has a nice dress.
The child knows how to write.

krio: Mi aunty de sell cold wata.
en: My aunt is selling cold water.
The baby knows how to talk.

krio: Di man de kolay pa the uman
en: The man is admiring the woman

krio: Di pikin de play na di sand
en: The child is playing in the sand.

krio: Ar wan go na di saloon for go do me hair
en: I want to go to the salon to do my hair.

en: I want to go to the church to pray.

en: I want to go to school to learn.

en: I want to go to the farm to plant rice.

en: I want to go to the market to buy food.

en: I want to go to the bar to drink beer.

krio: Ar wan go na di restaurant for eat
en: I want to go to the restaurant to eat food.

krio: Di pikin de play na di yard
en: The child is playing in the yard.

krio: Di pikin dem de play na di trit
en: The children are playing in the  street.

krio: Di pikin de play na di ose
en: The child is playing in the house.

krio: ar de kam go na hospital
en: i am going to the hospiatal

krio: Di mamie don don cook the plasas
en: The old lady has finished cooking the stew

krio: Ar de jomp na di bade
en: I am jumping on the bed

krio: Ar de jomp na di chair
en: I am jumping on the chair

krio: Ar de jomp na di table
en: I am jumping on the table

krio: Ar de jomp na di gron
en: I am jumping on the ground

krio: Ar de jomp na di sansan
en: I am jumping on the sand

krio: Di okada man splash the pɔtɔ pɔtɔr pa mi
en: The bike man splashed the mud on me

krio: Di street dorti afta the rain las net
en: The street is filty after the rain last night

krio: Tell the pikin Komot beyeh the dormot
en: Tell the child to leave behind the door

krio: Me ehn me sista de komot tumara
en: My sister and I are going out tomorrow

krio: Wetin u write pa the exam
en: What did you write in the exam

krio: Duya Tell the man le ihn sidom na the bench
en: Please Tell the man to sit on the chair

krio: Tell dem na boku tok de pa dem
Ar de wait tay ihn kam bifo ar go
en: I Am going to wait untill they come befor I go

krio: Ar de kam fry the pɛtɛtɛh
en: I am going to fry the potato
I am going to the market

krio: Di mami ala pa di pikin
en: The old  lady shout at the child

krio: U wan deny say nrtr u tiff the moni
en: You want to deny that u didn't steal the money

krio: Komot beyeh me this morni ya
Duya go lef dem pikin dem for me na skul
en: Please go and leave the children at school

krio: the pikin de coz rudeness na the place

en: I did not see you today
